description:
Great for ascending a fixed rope. The shunt is essentially a mechanical prusik. Releasing it forces the internal cam to grab the rope. Hold the cam open with your rope-free hand (much like guiding a prusik) to descend.

  • Use with 10-11mm single ropes, or 8-11mm double ropes of equal diameter
  • CE and UIAA approved
name: Petzl Shunt Rope Clamp
